episodes.synopsis: Despite protests by eco-activists, a team of scientists proceeds with a controversial project to harness dark energy using a proton accelerator.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Their experiment sabotaged by terrorists, the team fights to contain a dark energy black hole that's threatening to consume planet Earth.
episodes.title: Episode 2

video.title: Eve of Destruction
video.synopsis: When an experiment to harvest a limitless pool of "dark energy" goes awry, scientists scramble to fix their deadly mistake before more lives are lost.
